content.prompt: In White and Red Plum Blossoms, the artist Ogata Korin used abstracted organic forms, monumental scale, and lavish gold surfaces in order to

choices.label: appeal to the luxurious tastes of aristocrats
demonstrate the depth of his religious devotion
create a work influenced by Byzantine icons
